comment._content: "Mairie" means mayor's office, or city hall.

comment._content: Original Agence Meurisse photo on Gallica site, with caption "La foule devant la Mairie du XIe arrondissement pour toucher l'allocation " The crowd outside the 11th Arrondissement Mairie to receive the allowance

comment._content: Thanks for finding the source photo, artolog.  We'll add some of this information to the caption the next time we update.
